channel.title: Mount gMail as a filesystem
channel.description: Been wondering what to do with all those GMail invites? Well thanks to a couple of new developments you can now mount a gmail account as an external file system. First up, for lovers of penguins we have GmailFS a...
channel.dc:creator: Martin

item.title: Comment by Flamsmark+00:00
item.description: 2.3ish GB is nothing to scoff at, but what if we want a full drive? how could we use several accounts attached togeather to build a single larger drive, with a standard drive letter [on windows]?
item.dc:creator: Flamsmark
